TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Annotation extends System.Object implements class System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable
Public NotInheritable Class Annotation Implements IXmlSerializable

summary.span: Represents a user annotation in the Microsoft Annotations Framework.

span.span: Represents a user annotation in the Microsoft Annotations Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表與所有相關聯的錨定和內容資料的單一註解。 represents a single annotation with all associated anchoring and content data. 註解是由下列主要項目所組成。An annotation consists of the following main elements. - 零個、 一個或多個，識別哪些標註。Zero, one, or more that identify what is being annotated. - 零個、 一個或多個包含註解的使用者資料。Zero, one, or more that contain the user data for the annotation. - 零個、 一個或多個，定義註解的建立者。Zero, one, or more that define who created the annotation. - A指定註解的建立的時間與日期。A that specifies the date and time when the annotation was created. - A ，指定上次更新註解。A that specifies when the annotation was last updated. - 唯一的註解（全域唯一識別碼 (GUID)）。A unique annotation (a globally unique identifier (GUID)).

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: This constructor supports the Windows Presentation Foundation infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

span.span: This constructor supports the Windows Presentation Foundation infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 應用程式在沒有參數 – 預設建構函式不會完全初始化執行個體，不應該使用預設建構函式。Applications should not use the default constructor without parameters–the default constructor does not fully initialize the instance. 若要建立新應用程式應該使用其中一個參數為基礎的建構函式。To create a new applications should use one of the parameter-based constructors.

summary.span: This constructor supports the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

span.span: This constructor supports the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這個建構函式使用 WPF 序列化基礎結構，而且不應直接在一般情況下。This constructor is used by the WPF serialization infrastructure and should not be used directly under ordinary circumstances.

summary.span: Occurs when an anchor is added, removed, or modified in the list of annotation .

span.span: Occurs when an anchor is added, removed, or modified in the list of annotation .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當錨點是新增或移除，除了錨點子零件，例如若要變更任何修改，就會發生。In addition to when an anchor is added or removed, occurs on any modifications to an anchor subpart, such as a change to a .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Anchors As Collection(Of AnnotationResource)

summary.span: Gets a collection of zero or more anchor elements that define the data selection(s) being annotated.

span.span: Gets a collection of zero or more anchor elements that define the data selection(s) being annotated.

value.span: 零或多個集合錨定項目。

span.span: A collection of zero or more anchor elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個在集合會識別註釋繫結至資料選取範圍 （亦即，"的資料選取範圍正在標註 」）。Each in the collection identifies a data selection to which the annotation is bound (in other words, "the data selection that is being annotated"). 雖然大部分註解單一資料的選取項目，請參閱，並包含一個錨點，如果單一註解是指多個資料選取項目，就會發生多個錨點。While most annotations refer to a single data selection and contain just one anchor , multiple anchors can occur if a single annotation refers to multiple data selections. 傳回集合絕不會是 null; 不過，集合可以包含零個項目。The returned collection is never null; however, the collection may contain zero elements.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AnnotationType As XmlQualifiedName
public: property System::Xml::XmlQualifiedName ^ AnnotationType { System::Xml::XmlQualifiedName ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the of the annotation type.

span.span: Gets the of the annotation type.

value.span: 針對這類型的註解中的 XML 限定的名稱。

span.span: The XML qualified name for this kind of annotation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的註解類型是名稱當做參數傳遞給建構函式。The returned annotation type is the name passed as a parameter to the constructor. > [!NOTE] > 傳回`null`如果註解不正確地建構使用不含參數的預設建構函式。 returns `null` if the annotation was incorrectly constructed by using a default constructor without parameters. (不含參數的預設建構函式不會完全初始化執行個體，並只在內部使用 XML 序列化搭配。)若要建立新的註釋，應用程式應該使用建構函式做為參數。(The default constructor without parameters does not fully initialize the instance and is used only internally in combination with XML serialization.) To create a new annotation, applications should use the constructor that takes an as a parameter.

summary.span: Occurs when an author is added, removed, or modified in the list of annotation .

span.span: Occurs when an author is added, removed, or modified in the list of annotation .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Authors As Collection(Of String)

summary.span: Gets a collection of zero or more author strings that identify who created the .

span.span: Gets a collection of zero or more author strings that identify who created the .

value.span: 零或多個作者字串的集合。

span.span: A collection of zero or more author strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回絕不會是集合`null`; 不過，集合可以包含零個項目，如果沒有作者指定。The returned collection is never `null`; however, the collection can contain zero elements if no author is specified.

summary.span: Occurs when a cargo is added, removed, or modified in the list of annotation .

span.span: Occurs when a cargo is added, removed, or modified in the list of annotation .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了當新增或移除，貨物上的貨物子項，例如若要變更任何修改，就會發生在貨物的集合。In addition to when a cargo is added or removed, occurs on any modification to a cargo subpart, such as a change to an in the collection of a cargo.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cargos As Collection(Of AnnotationResource)

summary.span: Gets a collection of zero or more cargo elements that contain data for the annotation.

span.span: Gets a collection of zero or more cargo elements that contain data for the annotation.

value.span: 零或多個集合貨物項目的。

span.span: A collection of zero or more cargo elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個在集合包含使用者定義資料的註解。Each in the collection contains user-defined data for the annotation. 傳回集合絕不會是 null; 但是，集合可能包含零個元素的註解的任何使用者資料時。The returned collection is never null; however, the collection may contain zero elements if there is no user data for the annotation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CreationTime As DateTime
public: property DateTime CreationTime { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: Gets the date and the time that the annotation was created.

span.span: Gets the date and the time that the annotation was created.

value.span: 建立註釋的日期和時間。

span.span: The date and the time the annotation was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 會傳回如果使用預設值不正確地建立附註不含參數的建構函式。 returns if the annotation was incorrectly created by using the default constructor without parameters. 參數建構函式應該用來正確具現化新的註釋。An constructor with parameters should be used to correctly instantiate a new annotation.
